Title: Returns the funding levels for municipalities in which video lottery gaming facilities are located to the state fiscal year 2008-2009 levels
Summary: Returns the funding levels for municipalities in which video lottery gaming facilities are located to the state fiscal year 2008-2009 levels.
LawCode: Amd ยง54-l, St Fin L; amd ยง1, Chap 53 of 2013
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to returning the aid to localities payments for eligible municipalities in which video lottery gaming facilities are located to the 2008-2009 state fiscal year levels; and to amend chapter 53 of the laws of 2013, enacting the Aid to Localities budget, in relation to payments of aid to eligible municipalities in which video lottery gaming facilities are located
